specifications.title: Architecture Overview
specifications.summary: "Read me first" document for the overall architecture. Provides a summary of the reference, archetype and service models, and describes global semantics.
specifications.micro_summary: Global description of openEHR design principles and architecture

specifications.title: Foundation Types
specifications.summary: Specification of assumed, primitive and other foundation types required by all other specifications.

specifications.title: Base Types
specifications.summary: Specification of basic health informatics types used in other specifications.

specifications.title: Resource Model
specifications.summary: The Resource specification defines a formal model of authoring and IP meta-data, language translation and annotations that can be used by classes defining any concrete type of authored resource, such as a document, archetype or template.

specifications.title: S2 Change Control Model
specifications.summary: The Change Control Model describes the semantics of versioning for systems of record, supporting distributed versioning and merging.

expressions.title: Base UML
expressions.description: UML file for S2 Base classes, as MagicDraw 19. Contains UML 2.5 standard XMI file.
